lyric:
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Min Ho Choi/黄晞睿
[00:01.000] 作词 : Ji Ho Choi/林夕
[00:03.743]RAP作词人：Lambert
[00:05.743]编曲：余竑龍
[00:07.146] All we need to know is
[00:08.296]i  love you so much
[00:09.262]so we have to love
[00:10.645]and you need me  at the same time
[00:12.629]so i come from above
[00:13.696]nobody can stop and nobody can judge
[00:16.813]only lord knows we will never give up
[00:19.962]take you to my mom and i promise
[00:21.812]she will like you
[00:22.745]cause you’re spotless at the first sight
[00:24.528]when you step in the room
[00:25.729]holding tightly  darling
[00:27.445]now we gotta start it
[00:28.962]move your body
[00:29.536]it’s a party
[00:30.353]tonight you look so charming
[00:31.870]
[00:32.203]我翻山越岭只为
[00:33.646]找到迷失 的你
[00:34.769]把你装进我 心里
[00:36.205]然后带你穿过荆棘
[00:37.854]你知道我有多 坚定
[00:39.554]百分百的 去相信
[00:41.155]你也同样认定我
[00:42.621]彼此心心相印
[00:44.154]有我  陪在你身边 不会感到寒冷
[00:47.187]带你  离开这深渊 让剧情完整
[00:49.954]给你掌心的温 度   我就会觉得幸 福
[00:53.225]我们的姻缘 不需要 考虑 归途
[00:55.906]
[00:56.219]let me take my every minute
[00:57.422]and i know what you need
[00:58.721]show my loyalty anytime anywhere you can see
[01:01.553]you want our life to be steady  i swear i’ll finally make it
[01:04.586]i don’t need any else body
[01:06.169]cause my heart has no vacancy
[01:07.770]i cannot imagine one day live without you
[01:10.973]you will find everything that i’ve told you is true
[01:14.004]travel around the world  from London to New York
[01:16.938]find a place you like then i take you to  church
[01:19.770]
[01:20.053]i  love you so much
[01:21.503]so we have to love
[01:22.787]and you need me  at the same time
[01:24.387]so i come from above
[01:25.645]nobody can stop
[01:27.253]and nobody can judge
[01:28.753]only lord knows we will never give up
[01:31.854]
[01:32.120]i  love you so much
[01:33.319]so we have to love
[01:34.769]and you need me  at the same time
[01:36.353]so i come from above
[01:37.736]nobody can stop
[01:39.271]and nobody can judge
[01:40.736]only lord knows we will never give up
[01:43.736]
[01:44.053]love to feel the moment
[01:45.453]when you’re holding my hand
[01:46.753]no more friends
[01:47.471]and i will pick you up  in every  pouring rain
[01:49.822]baby don’t stop  we start  we talk about
[01:52.590]pieces of our life  with some kisses any type  whatever you like
[01:55.939]try my best to control my words
[01:57.990]cause i   don’t wanna hurt you
[01:59.222]we could go anywhere do anything
[02:01.256]we could do
[02:01.890]one day if you get yourself lost  going too far
[02:04.772]even end of the world i can find you we never be apart
[02:07.822]
[02:08.107]我们 的 感情 不需要 太多 犹豫
[02:10.906]没有头绪  就听听这首为你谱写的旋律
[02:14.057]每一寸 字 句 都表达着想要把你占据
[02:16.789]每个音符  都被我调成你微笑的频率
[02:19.889]我们乐此不疲 每天都是形影不离
[02:22.755]即使生活有时平淡无奇 我也为你制造惊喜
[02:25.956]依恋 你这件事 是我最大的坚持
[02:29.306]庆幸 这段际遇 能拥有地利天时
[02:31.847]
[02:32.123]i  love you so much
[02:33.357]so we have to love
[02:34.723]and you need me  at the same time
[02:36.640]so i come from above
[02:37.624]nobody can stop and nobody can judge
[02:40.690]only lord knows we will never give up
[02:43.773]
[02:44.107]i  love you so much
[02:45.257]so we have to love
[02:46.739]and you need me  at the same time
[02:48.416]so i come from above
[02:49.815]nobody can stop and nobody can judge
[02:52.798]only lord knows we will never give up
[02:55.634]
[02:55.817]CA：Ji Ho Choi/Min Ho Choi
[02:56.001]OP：Vinyl Entertaiment
[02:56.151]SP：索雅音乐版权代理（北京）有限公司（SAMP（Beijing）Co.，Ltd）
[02:56.317]制作人：余竑龍
[02:56.452]混音：余竑龍/欧姆
[02:56.584]配唱：余竑龍 / Emma郁采真
[02:56.701]母带：余竑龍
[02:56.869]和声编写：余竑龍 / Emma郁采真
[02:56.900]统筹：郑翰文/沈炳/李锴
